about_the_game:
Welcome to the next world

Stratospiel is a jam-packed powder keg of an action and turn-based RPG. You control a small child who awakens on a strange planet, all alone, with their memories gone. Face your fears and confront your enemies on your quest to discover the truth. And remember, nothing is ever truly as it seems.

Nutrition Facts

  • Hectic, fast, turn-based battles - dodge & deflect enemy attacks to reduce damage, time your attacks for an extra punch
  • Equally hectic, equally fast action elements like movement, puzzles, and platforming
  • Choose to befriend or defeat your enemies
  • Release endorphins through EXTREME EXERCISE
  • Lovable characters you can easily substitute for real-world friends
  • Built by one person - that personal touch you love so much
  • A soundtrack that sounds pretty good if I do say so myself
  • Beautiful pixel art
  • An occasional silly moment or two
  • Obligatory, out-of-place stealth sections that completely kill the pacing of the game
  • Gubby

reviews:
“Stratospiel is a brilliantly written comedy goldmine of a turn-based RPG.”
Beta Tested, Game Reviewed

“The next big RPG made by a single person will be on its way, and we're absolutely looking forward to having it released in the near future.​​”
Mega Cat Studios

“Makes me feel young again.”
Your Mom
short_description: A jam-packed powder keg of an action & turn-based RPG. Face your fears and confront your enemies in hectic, fast-paced combat on your quest to discover the truth.
